Table1.News title: California accelerating vaccinations for education and childcare workers
Table1.News content: The state will dedicate 10% of vaccines to K-12 school staff and childcare workers starting March 1. These workers will get special codes that let them schedule expedited appointments through myturn.ca.gov.

Table1.News title: New youth and adult sports guidance outlines a return to competition
Table1.News content: The California Department of Public Health has released new guidance for youth and adult recreational sports which will go into effect February 26. It shows which sports will be allowed to return to play in which tiers, based on level of contact and risk of coronavirus transmission.

Table1.News title: Maps of school reopenings in California now available
Table1.News content: The Safe Schools for All Hub now has Reopening Maps, which give a statewide snapshot of school reopenings across California. They list each school districtâ€™s current mode of instruction (in-person, hybrid, or distance learning) and link to its COVID safety plan.
